§ 50104. Studies of general maritime problems The Secretary of Transportation shall study all maritime problems arising in carrying out the policy in section 50101 of this title. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(b), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1558.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
